response.original_title: Nazi Stolen Art: The Final Restitution
response.overview: During World War II, Hitler's art advisor coordinated thousands of instances of plundering all over Europe. Some of the spoils were taken to the offices and homes of high-ranking officials, but the rest of these precious pieces were hidden away. This film examines the mechanisms of Nazi extortion during the second World War, and the current issues surrounding restitution. (Amazon Prime)
response.title: Nazi Stolen Art: The Final Restitution
